H0.text: Which Greek philosopher was said to have lived inside a barrel. Antisthenes

H1.text: Which Greek philosopher was said to have lived inside a barrel. Crates of Thebes

H2.text: Which Greek philosopher was said to have lived inside a barrel. Aristippus

H3.text: Which Greek philosopher was said to have lived inside a barrel. Diogenes

A4.text: Diogenes never lived in a barrel, as such containers did not exist in his time.

A5.text: Diogenes used a large ceramic jar (pithos), originally meant for food storage, as a makeshift shelter.

A6.text: Diogenes lived in a ceramic jar on the streets of Athens.
